sense.name: unwanted by_product material or substance
sense.examples: They are trying to clean up the industrial waste along the river front. The body removes toxins through its waste. That truck is not authorized to transport hazardous waste.

sense.name: the useless expenditure of a resource
sense.examples: It was a waste of time trying to talk him out of it. The booklet described a number of ways to reduce waste of energy in the home. Sally felt that only being an assistant to Bob was a waste of her own talent.

sense.name: a tract of desolate, barren land
sense.examples: He has trekked through the icy wastes of Antarctica. They wandered for days through the trackless waste of the desert.

sense.name: a legally recognized reduction in an estate's value from damage
sense.examples: This clause specifies the duty of the vendor to make repairs for the voluntary waste of the property. Damage from the tornado did not constitute permissive waste according to the court.
